name: The Lost Amulet
description:
Set in a fantasy world, the protagonist Taro finds himself awaking after a night of drunken adventure at the local tavern. He then realises that he has lost an amulet that is a valuable family heirloom and so must embark on a journey of information gathering and backtracking in order to find out where the amulet is or face the wrath of his grandfather.

The game itself is a short RPG adventure made in RPG maker as part of my undergraduate dissertation. There are two files available below.

  • The first version features a simplified dialogue version with very linear dialogue options.
  • The second version features the same gameplay but includes more detailed dialogue options.

Thank you for your interest in the game. :)
